name: BSDium
description: "BSCD is the circulating token of MStation, where most of the actions will consume BSCD, such as leveling up the character, PVE, item repair and so on. You could earn BSCD form Daily Mining and PVE, as well as trading on BSCStation Swap. The BSCD that users pay in game will be mostly used in burning or treasury, and will be rewarded to users via activities and missions in the future."
